alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 10:43PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Mississippi, eastern Clay, Pemiscot, Dunklin, northwestern Dyer, western Obion and Lake Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1043 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from East Prairie to near Portageville to near Kennett. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Kennett, Union City, Caruthersville, Malden, Piggott, Gosnell, Portageville, Hayti, Steele, Campbell, Reelfoot Lake State Park, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, Tiptonville, Ridgely, Troy, Holcomb, Hayti Heights, Cooter and Wardell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
